titleStmt.title: Act for securing the publick peace. At Hally-rude-house, the 14. day of February, 1678.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most sacred Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Al. Gibsone, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Requires all persons who have not signed the bond against conventicles to enroll themselves in the books of the Privy council, guaranteeing to keep the peace and not attend conventicles.
Imperfect: stained and torn with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
